:py:mod:`pyepo.data.portfolio`
==============================

.. py:module:: pyepo.data.portfolio

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Synthetic data for portfolio



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyepo.data.portfolio.genData



.. py:function:: genData(num_data, num_features, num_assets, deg=1, noise_level=1, seed=135)

   A function to generate synthetic data and features for travelling salesman

   :param num_data: number of data points
   :type num_data: int
   :param num_features: dimension of features
   :type num_features: int
   :param num_assets: number of assets
   :type num_assets: int
   :param deg: data polynomial degree
   :type deg: int
   :param noise_level: level of data random noise
   :type noise_level: float
   :param seed: random seed
   :type seed: int

   :returns: data features (np.ndarray), costs (np.ndarray)
   :rtype: tuple
